asset.author: breville
asset.hookText:
Subscribe to Breville for more healthy living recipes!
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=breville
For more about Breville, visit http://www.brevilleusa.com.

Seamus Mullen, Chef of Tertulia and author of Hero Food, is an authoritative voice for and seasoned expert in healthy food that tastes delicious. For Spring, Mullen enjoys cooking with both white and green asparagus. 

To read more about Chef Mullen's take on spring ingredients, read his article on Food Thinkers:
http://www.foodthinkers.com/articles/spring-fling/

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel:
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=breville

You can view the full recipe for Ensalada de Espárragos here:
http://foodthinkers.tplsandbox.com/2013/05/ensalada-de-esparragos/

Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/brevilleusa

Pin us on Pinterest:
http://pinterest.com/brevilleusa/

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/brevilleusa

See Chef Mullen's book, Hero Food: How Cooking with Delicious Things Can Make Us Feel Better:
http://www.amazon.com/Seamus-Mullens-Hero-Food-Delicious/dp/1449407587/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1365798472&sr=8-1&keywords=hero+foods+by+seamus+mullen

Breville has a new website check it out!
http://foodthinkers.com/

transcripts: I'm same as small and I'm the seventh trip to a restaurant here in new York city. I'm also the author of hero food and I love spring. Nothing says spring to me more than asparagus. Both white and green asparagus incredibly flavorful there are so many things you can do with it you can grill it. You can Blanche it makes soups. It's an amazing amazing rian to work with and it also is very good for us it's rich in antioxidants. It's got great dietary fiber all around it's a hero food in my book.
